body: i'm thankful that i finally filled my pill organizers after more than a week of having not done that and having to measure out my pills four times a day. i'm thankful to have folded the two loads of laundry that i had left sitting in the garage and the dryer. i'm thankful that lately, at arbitrary moments, i have been dropping to the ground and doing ten pushups.
